p: Potential interactions between marital status and condom use on HIV status was checked. The assumption was that the effect of condom use on HIV status is somewhat dependent on marital status. The p-value for interaction term was 0.67 which is far away from significance level and there was no much difference between the model with interaction term and the preliminary main effects model. Based on these observations we drooped the interaction term in the final model. The Hosmer-Lemeshow test result was p = 0.147, which indicated the fitness of the overall model.
